About Me

Who I Am

I'm a passionate B.Tech Computer Science student at JIS University with a strong foundation in web development, cloud computing, and software engineering. I believe in the power of technology to solve real-world problems and create meaningful digital experiences.

My journey in tech has been driven by curiosity and a commitment to continuous learning. I love exploring new technologies, collaborating with diverse teams, and contributing to open-source projects. Whether it's building beautiful user interfaces or architecting scalable backend systems, I approach every project with dedication and creativity.
